User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user with access to the BMV Dossier Viewer application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The role of the user, which determines their access level.

AccessAttempt.title: AccessAttempt
AccessAttempt.description: Stores information about user access attempts, including the token and security code.

id.description: Unique identifier for the access attempt.

userId.description: Reference to the User associated with this access attempt. (Relationship: User 1:N AccessAttempt)

accessCode.description: The one time access code sent to the user's email. This code is time-sensitive.

securityCode.description: The security code the user must enter to access the panel after successful login.

attemptedAt.description: Timestamp of when the access attempt was made.

isSuccessful.description: Indicates whether the access attempt was successful or not.

definition.description: Stores user profile information, including their role. The 'userId' is the Firebase Auth UID.
Stores access attempts for a user. Access is controlled via path-based ownership.

params.name: accessAttemptId
params.description: Unique identifier for the access attempt.
